title: The most average art
description:
A VAE trained on ImageNet-32. The VAE is apparently undertrained (intentionally?). After training for couple of hours. I asked VAE to spit out the most average art. Source:
https://colab.research.google.com/drive/1itbG2jvoae3Ha86JVE03MvTjIfTee_9s?usp=sharing
tools: Google Colab, Image-Net, Colab AI assistance
